summary: In a remote Icelandic farming valley, two brothers who haven't spoken in 40 years have to come together in order to save what's dearest to them - their sheep.
cast: Sigurður Sigurjónsson|Theodór Júlíusson|Charlotte Bøving|Jón Benónýsson|Gunnar Jónsson|Sveinn Ólafur Gunnarsson|Þorleifur Einarsson|Ingrid Jónsdóttir|Jörundur Ragnarsson|Viktor Már Bjarnason|Ólafur Ólafsson|Jenný Lára Arnórsdóttir|Guðrún Sveinbjörnsdóttir|Sigurlína Tryggvadóttir|Þorsteinn Gunnar Bjarnason|Anna Sæunn Ólafsdóttir|Sigurdur Hlynur Snaebjornsson|Þorgerdur Sigurgeirsdottir|Þorgrimur Danielsson|Hjörtur Hólm Hermannsson|Hörður Þór Benónýsson|Elísabet Gunnarsdóttir|Karl Pálsson|Eydís Helga Pétursdóttir|Broddi Broddason|Vidur frá Halldorsstadir|Grami frá Laekjavellir|Panda|Falki frá Myri|Litlaljós|Kruselia|Gæf|Jökla|Feit|Blid|Saga
keywords: sheep|ram|sheep farm|brother brother reconciliation|brother brother relationship
title: Rams (El valle de los carneros)
